thread.section_title: About.com California Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: That Many? 101 Things to Do on Catalina Island
thread.title_full: That Many? 101 Things to Do on Catalina Island

title: That Many? 101 Things to Do on Catalina Island
text:
Go to the Flying Fish Festival (May) Check out the plants at the Botanical Garden Look for orange garibaldi fish swimming in shallow water Rent a vacation rental house, invite your friends and have a party Pick up a copy of Hollywood Isle: Catalina Island Picture Book by Greg Reitman. It's a great souvenir Visit the Aviary. It's one of Catalina's quirky contradictions - no birds here Celebrate Independence Day by watching a golf cart parade Don't be like President Warren G. Harding. He died a week before he was supposed to visit Check out the oldest house at the corner of Marilla and Vieudelou Learn all the lyrics to the song 26 Miles and sing it on the way there Stop and smell the eucalyptus and the wild fennel Relax Make plans to come back 
The original list came to us courtesy of Catalina Island Visitor's Magazine , but we've made a lot of changes since then. Related Articles
